wikipedia_page.main: Malcolm Bruce Slater (born 22 October 1939) was a Scottish former professional footballer, who played as a Winger. A product of the Highland League club Buckie Thistle, Slater played in the Scottish Football League for Celtic and Montrose, the English Football League for Southend United, Leyton Orient and Colchester United. He also played non-league football in both Scotland and England for Inverness Caledonian of the Highland League, and Folkestone Town of the English Southern League at that time.
